projects.title: Tenzies
projects.description: An interactive dice game where players roll until all dice show the same number. Features a timer and high score tracking with localStorage.*In this project I learned how to use React useState hook and persistent data storage.*The hardest part was implementing a real-time timer and integrating localStorage for tracking high scores.

projects.title: ChefClaude
projects.description: This website gives you a recipe with the ingredients that you want.*Since the AI boom I always wanted to use it for a project made by me. This project help me figure out how Al models work under the hood and how to give a sensible and usable response to render into a page.*The hardest roadblock I had was trying to understand how to translate an Al response into something I could render.

projects.description: A brief description of what this project does and its main features.
